title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7322.6 - Review and assessment of reportable incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7322.6 - Review and assessment of reportable incidents

State Regulations
(a) The director shall develop and implement
procedures for the review, investigation, and assessment of reportable
incidents. (b) The director shall
regularly review all reports prepared by facility staff in conjunction with the
review and/or investigation of reportable incidents, including pertinent
facility log entries. (c) The
director, or designee, shall take appropriate actions, based upon such review
of prior incidents, to reduce the possibility of recurrence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7322.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
